text: Antony Daniel Costa (born 23 June 1981) is a British singer-songwriter and actor. He was born in Edgware, London to a Jewish mother and Greek father. He is best known as a member of boy band Blue. In 2006 he released a solo album, Heart Full of Soul. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:English singer-songwriters Category:English television actors Category:Singers from London
title: Antony Costa
